languages.text: "В своем изгнании мне довелось повстречать множество спутников, что временно разделяли мой путь без начала и конца". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Одним из таких спутников был мой собрат-изгой, что уже прошел множеством путей. Он и поведал мне о ритуале единения — великой возможности прикоснуться душой к Контуру бесконечности мира-корабля, знакомого провидцам, проводящим сей ритуал. Как и сказал Шайрэнкхей, провидцы Крудараха уже связывалась с Алайтоком. Значит... и я смогу".

traits.locale_text: "В своем изгнании мне довелось повстречать множество спутников, что временно разделяли мой путь без начала и конца". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает галаза.{/n} "Одним из таких спутников был мой собрат-изгой, что уже прошел множеством путей. Он и поведал мне о ритуале единения — великой возможности прикоснуться душой к Контуру бесконечности мира-корабля, знакомого провидцам, проводящим сей ритуал. Как и сказал Шайрэнкхей, провидцы Крудараха уже связывалсь с Алайтоком. Значит... и я смогу".

languages.text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."
languages.original_text: "В своем изгнании мне довелось повстречать множество спутников, что временно разделяли мой путь без начала и конца". {n}Ирлиэт прикрывает глаза.{/n} "Одним из таких спутников был мой собрат-изгой, что уже прошел множеством путей. Он и поведал мне о ритуале единения — великой возможности прикоснуться душой к Контуру бесконечности мира-корабля, знакомого провидцам, проводящим сей ритуал. Как и сказал Шайрэнкхей, провидцы Крудараха уже связывалась с Алайтоком. Значит... и я смогу".

traits.locale_text: "During the exile I met many companions who temporarily joined me in my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — an exciting opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld familiar to the seers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach seers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

"During the exile I met many companions who temporarily joined me in my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow outcast who had already completed many Paths. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach seers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

"During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

languages.text: «Durante mi exilio he conocido a muchos compañeros que se han unido a mí temporalmente en mis interminables viajes». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos.{/n} «Uno de ellos fue un camarada proscrito que ya había completado numerosas sendas. Él fue quien me habló del ritual de la unidad, una gran oportunidad para proyectar el espíritu y entrar en contacto con el Circuito Infinito del mundo astronave, tan conocido para los videntes que lo llevan a cabo. Shairenkhei dijo que los videntes de Crudarach ya habían contactado con Alaitoc. Eso significa... que yo también puedo».
languages.original_text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

traits.locale_text: «Durante mi exilio he conocido a muchos compañeros que se han unido a mí temporalmente en mis interminables viajes». {n}Yrliet cierra los ojos.{/n} «Uno de ellos fue un camarada proscrito que ya había completado numerosas sendas. Él fue quien me habló del ritual de la unidad, una fascinante oportunidad para proyectar el espíritu y entrar en contacto con el Circuito Infinito del mundo astronave, tan familiar para los videntes que lo llevan a cabo. Shairenkhei dijo que los videntes de Crudarach ya habían contactado con Alaitoc. Eso significa... que yo también puedo».

languages.text: “在流浪的这段期间，我遇到了许多同伴，他们曾短暂加入过我的无尽旅途。”{n}伊莉耶特闭上眼睛。{/n}“我曾与某位经历过诸多道途的流浪者结伴而行，他告诉了我关于联结仪式的事。那是某种伟大的仪式，我们方舟灵族可以延伸灵魂，触碰由方舟世界先知构建的永恒回路。榭伦凯说，克鲁达拉赫的先知已经联系到了阿莱托克。这意味着……这意味着我也可以做到。”
languages.original_text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

traits.locale_text: “在流浪的这段期间，我遇到了许多同伴，他们曾短暂加入过我的无尽旅途。”{n}伊莉耶特闭上眼睛。{/n}“我曾与某位经历过诸多道途的流浪者结伴而行，他告诉了我关于联结仪式的事。那是一种非常激动人心的仪式，我们方舟灵族可以延伸灵魂，触碰由方舟世界先知构建的永恒回路。榭伦凯说，克鲁达拉赫的先知已经联系到了阿莱托克。这意味着……这意味着我也可以做到。”

languages.text: « Au cours de mon exil, j'ai rencontré bien des gens qui m'ont accompagnée quelque temps dans mes voyages sans fin, {n}raconte Yrliet en fermant les yeux.{/n} L'un d'eux était un Errant qui avait déjà suivi de nombreuses Voies jusqu'au bout. C'est lui qui m'a enseigné le rituel d'unité, une pratique incroyable qui permet à l'esprit d'atteindre le Circuit d'Infinité d'un vaisseau-monde que connaissent les Grands Prophètes exécutant le rituel. D'après Shairenkhei, les Grands Prophètes de Crudarach ont déjà contacté Alaitoc, ce qui signifie... que j'en suis moi aussi capable. »
languages.original_text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

traits.locale_text: « Au cours de mon exil, j'ai rencontré de bien des gens qui m'ont accompagnée quelque temps dans mes voyages sans fin, {n}raconte Yrliet en fermant les yeux.{/n} L'un d'eux était un Errant qui avait déjà suivi de nombreuses Voies jusqu'au bout. C'est lui qui m'a enseigné le rituel d'unité, une pratique remarquable qui permet à l'esprit d'atteindre le Circuit d'Infinité d'un vaisseau-monde que connaissent les prophètes exécutant le rituel. D'après Shairenkhei, les prophètes de Crudarach ont déjà contacté Alaitoc, ce qui signifie... que j'en suis moi aussi capable. »

languages.text: 「追放中、私は一時的に私の果てしない旅に加わった、様々な仲間と出会った」{n}ユリエットは目を閉じる。{/n}「そのような仲間の一人は、既に多くの道を歩んできた追放者だった。団結の儀式について教えてくれたのは彼だった…自分の精神が手を伸ばし、それを行う予見者たちに親しまれている方舟の無限回路に触れる素晴らしい機会だ。シャイレンケイの話では、クルダラの予見者たちはすでにアライトックとコンタクトをとっているという。つまりは…私にもできる、というわけだ」
languages.original_text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

traits.locale_text: 「追放中、私は一時的に私の果てしない旅に加わった、様々な仲間と出会った」{n}ユリエットは目を閉じる。{/n}「そのような仲間の一人は、既に多くの道を歩んできた追放者だった。団結の儀式について教えてくれたのは彼だった…自分の精神が手を伸ばし、それを行う予見者たちに親しまれている方舟の無限回路に触れる刺激的な機会だ。シャイレンケイの話では、クルダラの予見者たちはすでにアライトックとコンタクトをとっているという。つまりは…私にもできる、というわけだ」

languages.text: "Während meines Exils bin ich vielen Gefährten begegnet, die sich mir auf meinen endlosen Reisen angeschlossen haben." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen.{/n} "Ein solcher Gefährte war ein anderer Ausgestoßener, der bereits viele Pfade abgeschlossen hatte. Er hat mir vom Ritual der Einheit erzählt, einer aufregenden Möglichkeit, wie der eigene Geist sich ausstrecken kann. Er kann so die Unendlichkeitsmatrix des Weltenschiffs berühren, mit dem die Runenpropheten vertraut sind, welche das Ritual ausführen. Shairenkhei sagte, die Runenpropheten von Crudarach hätten Alaitoc bereits kontaktiert. Das bedeutet ... Das bedeutet, dass ich das auch kann."
languages.original_text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

traits.locale_text: "Während meines Exils bin ich vielen Gefährten begegnet, die sich mir auf meinen endlosen Reisen angeschlossen haben." {n}Yrliet schließt die Augen.{/n} "Ein solcher Gefährte war ein anderer Ausgestoßener, der bereits viele Pfade abgeschlossen hatte. Er hat mir vom Ritual der Einheit erzählt, einer aufregenden Möglichkeit, wie der eigene Geist sich ausstrecken kann. Er kann so die Unendlichkeitsmatrix des Weltenschiffs berühren, mit dem die Seher vertraut sind, welche das Ritual ausführen. Shairenkhei sagte die Seher von Crudarach hätten Alaitoc bereits kontaktiert. Das bedeutet ... Das bedeutet, dass ich das auch kann."

languages.text: "Sürgündeki günlerimde sonu gelmeyen yolculuklarıma geçici olarak eşlik eden pek çok yoldaş tanıdım." {n}Yrliet, gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu yoldaşlardan biri, hâlihazırda pek çok Yolun sonuna erişen bir Yurtsuz dostumdu. Bana birlik ayininden bahseden de oydu. Bu ayin, ayini gerçekleştiren Ötesezenlerce bilinen bir gemidünyanın Ebedî Devresine ruhunun uzanarak ulaşması için muazzam bir fırsat vadeder. Shairenkhei, Crudarach Ötesezenlerinin hâlihazırda Alaitoc ile iletişime geçtiklerini söyledi. Bu da... Benim de yapabileceğim anlamına geliyor."
languages.original_text: "During my exile, I met many companions who temporarily joined me on my endless travels." {n}Yrliet closes her eyes.{/n} "One such companion was a fellow Outcast who had already completed many Paths. It was he who told me about the ritual of unity — a great opportunity for one's spirit to reach out and touch the Infinity Circuit of the craftworld known to the Farseers who perform it. Shairenkhei said that the Crudarach Farseers have already contacted Alaitoc. This means... This means I can, too."

traits.locale_text: "Sürgündeki günlerimde sonu gelmeyen yolculuklarıma geçici olarak eşlik eden pek çok yoldaş tanıdım." {n}Yrliet, gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu yoldaşlardan biri, hâlihazırda pek çok Yolun sonuna erişen bir Yurtsuz dostumdu. Bana birlik ayininden bahseden de oydu. Bu ayin, ayini gerçekleştiren Ötesezenlerce bilinen bir gemidünyanın Ebedî Devresine ruhunun uzanarak ulaşması için muazzam bir fırsat vadeder. Shairenkhei, Crudarach Ötesezenlerinin hâlihazırda Alaitoc ile iletişime geçtiklerini söyledi. Bu da... Benim de yapabileceğim anlamına geliyor."
